a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia ARAD-ka {1}x x x x lu DI-mu a-na LUGAL EN-ia {1}x x x x x šu-u₂ a-di {LU₂}hu-ub-te-šu₂ ina pa-ni-ia i-tuq-ta x x x x {KUR}ha-am-ra-na-a.a x x x x ah-ti-ri-di is-si-šu₂ ad-du-bu-ub mu-uk {LU₂}ma-aq-tu₂ at-ta x x x-sa-na-ka x x x ma-a UGU mi-ni x x x x x ni x x x x x x+x x x x x x x {LU₂}ERIM-MEŠ x x x x-ni-ni x x x {MUL}SAG.ME.GAR x x x-ni ma-a x x x x ina ŠA₃ {LU₂}GAL-MEŠ x x x x ma-a ina IGI LUGAL la-aq-bi an-nu-rig ina UGU LUGAL EN-ia i-tal-ka LUGAL be-li₂ liš-al-šu₂
